short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for sending/receiving bullet screens on any web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow you to send "bullet screen" (scrolling comments) to any webpage and receive "bullets" from other users from the same page. It provides a very special chatting experience and is very popular in Japan and China.
